use_cases.name: Business Trip First International
use_cases.description: First international transaction on business trip - legitimate but unusual
use_cases.why_subtle: First international use, expensive, but aligns with business traveler profile

use_cases.name: Account Takeover Subtle Pattern
use_cases.description: Sophisticated ATO mimicking user behavior but with subtle tells
use_cases.why_subtle: Attacker studied patterns, but slight velocity and device anomalies reveal fraud

use_cases.name: Elderly Customer Service Help
use_cases.description: Elderly customer getting help from grandchild - legitimate assistance
use_cases.why_subtle: Different device, typing pattern, but legitimate family help scenario

use_cases.name: Friendly Fraud Setup
use_cases.description: Customer planning chargeback - buying from new seller
use_cases.why_subtle: Legitimate customer history but pattern matches friendly fraud preparation

use_cases.name: College Student End of Semester
use_cases.description: Student maxing card for books/supplies - legitimate but risky pattern
use_cases.why_subtle: High utilization, multiple purchases, but consistent with semester start

use_cases.name: Small Business Cash Flow Crisis
use_cases.description: Business owner using personal card for business emergency - legitimate stress
use_cases.why_subtle: Unusual pattern, high amount, but matches small business emergency pattern

use_cases.name: Card Testing Sophisticated
use_cases.description: Subtle card testing with donation pattern - should catch
use_cases.why_subtle: Small amounts, charity merchant, but velocity pattern reveals testing

use_cases.name: New Immigrant First Purchase
use_cases.description: Recent immigrant making first US purchase - legitimate but no history
use_cases.why_subtle: No credit history, new account, but legitimate refugee/immigrant pattern

use_cases.name: Mule Account Layering
use_cases.description: Money mule moving funds - sophisticated laundering
use_cases.why_subtle: Account looks normal, but rapid in/out pattern reveals mule activity

use_cases.name: Tax Professional Quarterly Payment
use_cases.description: CPA making large quarterly tax payment for client - legitimate but unusual
use_cases.why_subtle: Large government payment, professional context, legitimate pattern

use_cases.name: Synthetic Identity Establishing Pattern
use_cases.description: Early stage synthetic identity building history - should catch
use_cases.why_subtle: Perfect payment history but artificial pattern, thin file red flags

use_cases.name: Medication Emergency Purchase
use_cases.description: Emergency medication purchase while traveling - legitimate urgent need
use_cases.why_subtle: Unusual location, high amount for pharmacy, but emergency pattern

use_cases.name: Subscription Stacking Fraud
use_cases.description: Creating multiple family accounts for resale - sophisticated fraud
use_cases.why_subtle: Uses different cards, appears legitimate, but pattern reveals abuse

use_cases.name: Divorce Asset Split Payment
use_cases.description: Court-ordered asset transfer during divorce - legitimate but unusual
use_cases.why_subtle: Large transfer, emotional context, but legally mandated

use_cases.name: Romance Scam Victim Transfer
use_cases.description: Victim sending money to romance scammer - authorized but fraudulent
use_cases.why_subtle: Customer authorizing but clear scam pattern, emotional manipulation

metadata.purpose: Test system ability to distinguish subtle fraud from legitimate edge cases
